name: nel2nelini
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wn(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
-| wn(wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c0, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
-| wn(wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c0, c2)), wn(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2))))

comment: Membership in an intersection implies membership in the second set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
